name: Maitri
description: Culturally specific shelter and support for South Asian families
fullDescription: Maitri serves South Asian families in the Bay Area, providing culturally specific support services including a helpline, emergency shelter, counseling, and legal assistance in multiple languages.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24-hour helpline
- Emergency shelter
- Case management
- Legal advocacy
- Counseling services
- Support groups
- Immigration assistance
- Services in Hindi, Gujarati, Tamil, and more
howToGetIt:
1. Call helpline: 888-862-4874
2. Services in your language
3. Speak with trained advocate
4. Receive confidential support
5. Access shelter if needed
6. Connect with ongoing services
keywords: Maitri, South Asian, Santa Clara County, Hindi, Gujarati, Tamil, helpline, emergency shelter, case management, legal advocacy, immigration assistance, 888-862-4874
